image_analysis.description: A composite image showing four pages of a legal deposition transcript. The pages are numbered 93, 95, 94, and 96, arranged in a 2x2 grid. Each page features a two-column format with timestamps and line numbers on the left and the transcribed text on the right. The document includes headers with page numbers and footers with deposition service information, dates, and a document control number.
image_analysis.layout: The image displays four distinct pages (93, 95, 94, 96) in a grid. Each page is a two-column transcript with timestamps and line numbers in the left column and dialogue in the right column. Headers and footers are present on each page.

01:47:21  21   logs were provided by Bruce Reinhart who was a

01:47:36   2   a -- a law firm or private operation that was

01:47:52   8           So that, again, aroused suspicion that the

01:47:58  11           But even -- I mean, you know, I think the
01:48:00  12   problem with -- you know, you can't sanitize
01:48:02  13   everything. That would be too suspicious. And
01:48:04  14   so what -- what was -- was -- what was evident on
01:48:07  15   these flight logs was, for example, approximately
01:48:11  16   ten flights by Mr. Dershowitz with Tatiana has --
01:48:18  17   has been discussed; with Maxwell; with Jeffrey
01:48:21  18   Epstein. One of them had one female, which,
01:48:25  19   again, in the context that I was looking at,
01:48:27  20   seemed to be a potential code word for
01:48:28  21   underage -- underage girl.
01:48:32  22           And so those flight logs showed, you know,
01:48:35  23   again, close association and travel with --
01:48:40  24   with -- with -- with Mr. Dershowitz, and
01:48:47  25   Mr. Epstein.

document_metadata.subject: Deposition concerning flight logs related to Epstein, Dershowitz, and Dave Rogers.

notes: The document is a composite of four pages from a larger deposition transcript. The content discusses the production and analysis of flight logs in relation to litigation involving Jeffrey Epstein. The speakers are identified as 'THE WITNESS', 'MR. SCOTT', 'MR. SIMPSON', and 'MR. SCAROLA'.
